abstract: Ukranian minority leader and former Prime Min Yulia V Tymoshenko, during visit to Washington, says she and her allies will strongly oppose constitutional changes United States and Europe say are necessary to maintain peace agreement with Russia; comments point to difficulties faced by nearly year-old agreement.

headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Ex-Premier’s Visit to Washington Highlights Obstacles Facing Peace Pact
headline.main: Ukrainian Ex-Premier’s Visit to Washington Highlights Obstacles Facing Peace Pact

snippet: Yulia V. Tymoshenko said she would staunchly oppose constitutional changes that the United States and European powers view as crucial to a peace agreement with Russia.
lead_paragraph: Yulia V. Tymoshenko said she would staunchly oppose constitutional changes that the United States and European powers view as crucial to a peace agreement with Russia.
